column5: Issued by Enviroment Canada....  Sarnia - Petrolia - Western Lambton County 10:26 PM EST Monday 7 January 2008 Tornado watch for Windsor - Sarnia - Petrolia - Western Lambton County issued  Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Watch for updated statements. Please refer to the latest public forecasts for further details and continue to monitor the situation through your local radio and television stations or Weatheradio.  Watford - Pinery Park - Eastern Lambton County   The Weird weather Continues!
